"

Demo Page with geo links

This page contains geo links to the "Brandenburg Gate in Berlin, Germany" (52.51,13.35) in different formats.

Click one of the links below, and choose Photos Nearby.

  • geo uri geo:0,0?q=52.51,13.35(Brandenburg Gate in Berlin, Germany)
  • here.com https://share.here.com/52.51,13.35,14
  • google maps https://maps.google.com/maps?q=loc:52.51,13.35(Brandenburg+Gate+in+Berlin,+Germany)
  • yandex https://maps.yandex.com/maps/?ll=13.35,52.51&z=14
  • openstreetmap https://www.openstreetmap.org/?#map=14/52.51/13.35

"
